missions.name: king_in_making
missions.title: A King in the making
missions.description: Under Chancellor Irene's watchful eye, Prince Tybalt is undergoing intense training. Bad news brought by Captain Claude confirmed her fears: only a military action by the Prince himself can unite warring nations and put an end to Grim's plans.

missions.name: obsidian_shadow
missions.title: Obsidian shadow
missions.description: Accompanied by Captain Claude and a group of Royal Knights, Prince Tybalt begins his march to rescue his father. His first objective is one of the border bases of Amber Noon, where he hopes to enlist the help of one of the loyalist cohorts. But only when they arrive, the extent of Grim's corruption is revealed.

missions.name: cracked_sapphire
missions.title: Cracked Sapphire
missions.description: General Cyrus, released from unjust inprisonment, comes back for Commando Blake. But his old subordinate has a new master now. As it turns out, this particular business might not have been as good as President Gideon thought.

missions.name: noble_redemption
missions.title: Noble redemption
missions.description: Following advice from General Cyrus, Prince Tybalt and his loyal soldiers are pushing north, looking for a way to encircle the Amber Fortress. Narrow valleys of the mountainous region ahead should help them stay undetected.

missions.name: in_the_name_of_the_king
missions.title: In the name of the King
